name: Vitale #30
description: Your 4.52 carat Fancy Greyish Yellow diamond is very unique, with a subtle and elegant combination of hues. The unique coloration of your diamond is believed to result from a combination of natural radiation exposure, the presence of nitrogen atoms, and other trace elements during the formation process. A symbol of enduring beauty, the combination of grey and yellow hues in your diamond may represent a balance between stability and warmth.
